statements: UPDATE supplier_risk_assessment SET financial_data = '{"revenue": 1000000, "profit": 200000}', industry_trends = 'Positive outlook' WHERE supplier_id = 123
UPDATE supplier_risk_assessment SET past_performance_records = 'Stable growth over the past year', industry_trends = 'Neutral forecasts' WHERE supplier_id = 456
UPDATE supplier_risk_assessment SET financial_data = '{"revenue": 500000, "profit": 70000}', industry_trends = 'Stable Growth', past_performance_records = 'Positive' WHERE supplier_id = 12345;
UPDATE supplier_risk_assessment SET past_performance_records = 'Declining', industry_trends = 'Competitive Market', financial_data = '{"revenue": 800000, "profit": 60000}' WHERE supplier_id = 54321;
UPDATE suppliers SET supplier_name='ABC Supplies', financial_data='{"revenue": 500000}', industry_trends='{"growth": "Stable"}' WHERE supplier_id=1
UPDATE risk_assessments SET risk_score=8, assessment_date='2022-09-15' WHERE supplier_id=1
UPDATE suppliers SET financial_data = '{"revenue": 500000, "expenses": 300000}' WHERE supplier_name = 'Supplier A';
UPDATE risk_assessments SET risk_score = 8, assessment_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE supplier_id = 101;
UPDATE suppliers SET supplier_name = 'Updated Supplier A' WHERE supplier_id = 1;
UPDATE financial_data SET revenue = 150000, expenses = 75000, profit = 75000 WHERE supplier_id = 1;

UPDATE suppliers SET industry_trends = '{"current": "positive", "future": "optimistic"}', past_performance_records = '{"2019": {"revenue": 500000, "expenses": 300000, "profit": 200000}, "2020": {"revenue": 600000, "expenses": 350000, "profit": 250000}}' WHERE supplier_id = 101;
UPDATE risk_assessments SET risk_score = 8, assessment_date = '2021-09-30' WHERE supplier_id = 102;
UPDATE suppliers SET supplier_name = 'ACME Suppliers' WHERE supplier_id = 1;
UPDATE financial_data SET annual_revenue = 750000.00 WHERE supplier_id = 1;
UPDATE suppliers SET financial_data = '{"revenue": 1000000, "debt_ratio": 0.5, "profit_margin": 0.25}' WHERE supplier_id = 1;
UPDATE risk_assessments SET financial_rating = 3, performance_rating = 4 WHERE risk_id = 5;
UPDATE supplier_risk_assessment SET financial_health_rating = 4 WHERE supplier_id = 123;
UPDATE financial_data SET cash_flow = 150000.50, revenue = 5000000.75 WHERE supplier_id = 456;
UPDATE supplier_risk_assessment SET financial_health_rating = 7, past_performance_score = 8 WHERE supplier_id = 101;
UPDATE financial_data SET revenue = 2500000.00, cash_flow = 150000.00 WHERE supplier_id = 201;
